hero.core.christian.biography: Sir Christian is a notorious sissy boy. His father has all but given up on his son becoming a great and powerful warlord.
hero.core.yog.biography: Yog studied many years with the Wizards of Bracada, but he would rather spend his time engaging in swordplay rather than studying magic.
hero.core.yog.specialty.description: Casts Chain Lightning with increased effect, based on hero level compared to the level of the target unit.
hero.core.yog.specialty.name: Chain Lightning
